pkgmetadata.longdescription: Football Match Data of European Leagues // Contains match results from seven European men's football leagues, namely Premier League (England), Ligue 1 (France), Bundesliga (Germany), Serie A (Italy), Primera Division (Spain), Eredivisie (The Netherlands), Super Lig (Turkey). Includes Seasons 2010/2011 until 2019/2020 and a set of interesting covariates. Can be used all purposes.
